text: Apparently the libgit2 version for v1.0.5 has two [security](<https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-12278>) [issues](<https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-12279>) which is causing issues supporting/building it using Nix (I am trying to clean up the mess that is Julia on Nix at the moment). Was this discussed somewhere? A few searches on GitHub and Discourse left me with empty hands.

elements.text: Apparently the libgit2 version for v1.0.5 has two [security](

) which is causing issues supporting/building it using Nix (I am trying to clean up the mess that is Julia on Nix at the moment). Was this discussed somewhere? A few searches on GitHub and Discourse left me with empty hands.

text: Which version of Julia uses libgit2 v1.0.5? :thinking_face:

elements.text: Which version of Julia uses libgit2 v1.0.5?

text: I have checked v1.0.4 and v1.0.5, both are affected as far as I can tell from `deps/libgit2.version`.

elements.text: I have checked v1.0.4 and v1.0.5, both are affected as far as I can tell from

text: Oh, because they're much older than v1.0.5 :sweat_smile:

elements.text: Oh, because they're much older than v1.0.5

text: Probably all julia versions up to v1.5 are affected

elements.text: Probably all julia versions up to v1.5 are affected

text: No, we switched to libgit2 1.x at some point and it is not affected.

elements.text: No, we switched to libgit2 1.x at some point and it is not affected.

text: Compiling with 0.28.4 right now, hopefully that will do the trick for Nix, but the official binaries will still be affected.

elements.text: Compiling with 0.28.4 right now, hopefully that will do the trick for Nix, but the official binaries will still be affected.

text: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/blob/release-1.5/deps/libgit2.version|https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/blob/release-1.5/deps/libgit2.version> 1.5 still uses 0.28 as far as I can see. We switched to libgit2 1.1 with julia v1.6

elements.text: 1.5 still uses 0.28 as far as I can see. We switched to libgit2 1.1 with julia v1.6

text: Fun fact, for v1.5.3 Nix just did not give a crap and compiles it with libgit2 v1.1.0, disables tests, and it kind of works. '^^

elements.text: Fun fact, for v1.5.3 Nix just did not give a crap and compiles it with libgit2 v1.1.0, disables tests, and it kind of works. '^^

text: I want to have a word with other maintainers…
